ygData.subject: Re: Question about Brass Instruments and the Cinda's Charismatic Carillon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Isn t the mino horn considered a wind instrument? I also cannot seem to get Cinda s Charismatic Carillon to work.  Who is supposed to be targeted? the NPC you
ygData.messageBody:
Isn't the mino horn considered a wind instrument? I also cannot seem
to get Cinda's Charismatic Carillon to work. Who is supposed to be
targeted? the NPC you are buying/selling to? or yourself? I've
spoken to other bards on Povar, and I was told they couldn't get the
song working either. Would someone please enlighten us as to what we
are doing wrong?

-Minda


>From: "Joseph \"Burnt Toast\" Chang" <jkchang@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Question about Brass Instruments and the Cinda's
Charismatic Carillon?
>Date: Mon, 19 Apr 1999 20:19:06 -0700
>
>From: "Joseph \"Burnt Toast\" Chang" <jkchang@...>
>
> I was wondering where I could buy a brass instrument (there
doesn't seem to
>be any in Kelethin, a minotaur horn isn't a brass instrument so I
assume
>that the regular horn in the guild shop isn't one either) and what
is the
>TRUE use of Cinda's Charismatic Carillon? I know you have to target
>yourself, but the song keeps ended after one pulse. Is it supposed
to do
>that? I haven't seen any improvement in merchant prices either, is
that
>maybe I don't have a brass instrument equipped when I sing it? Are
you
>supposed to click on the merchant when you have the song icon in the
active
>spells area?
>
>
